definitions.definition: Any bird of the genus Falco , all of which are birds of prey .
Any bird of prey of the subfamilies Falconinae and Herpetotherinae .
A female such bird, a male being a tiercel .
A light cannon used from the 15th to the 17th century.

main_definition: Any bird of the genus Falco , all of which are birds of prey .
secondary_definitions: Any bird of prey of the subfamilies Falconinae and Herpetotherinae .
( falconry ) A female such bird, a male being a tiercel .
( historical ) A light cannon used from the 15th to the 17th century.
